728749f-a.text:
508 Clove Road, adjoining the N.W. corner of Forest Ave. It was the home of Chas. W. Lang, Director of the Staten Island Museum (1898 to 1907 maps), and earlier that of Abram C. Stimers, U.S.N. (1874 map).
March 26, 1911.
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.
728749f-a.folder: Clove Road & Forest Avenue, Staten Island, NY

728750f-a.text:
562 Clove Road, south of the S.W. corner of Forest Ave., showing a side view of the Brooks home, as seen from Forest Ave. The
Brooks estate was known as Brooklawn.
May 16, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
728750f-a.folder: Clove Road & Forest Avenue, Staten Island, NY
